name: Castle Defence - Archer Shooting Game
description: Play as an archer who must defend his tower in this tower defence game. Summon knights to do your bidding, shoot down a volley of arrows, and bolster your health with upgrades as you advance through the levels. Use the gold obtained from each enemy kill to upgrade your power, health, speed, and mana as well as buy new skills to use! Add an extra arrow to each shot, or replenish some of your tower's health as you look to keep yourself alive!
